TITLE: Elective
DEF: Courses that are not mandatory in a program but are taken out of interest
TASK: The Elective pattern empowers learners by enabling course selection based on personal interests, not solely program obligations. This pattern heightens motivation, enhances engagement, and enables personalized learning pathways. A significant challenge is ensuring these courses supplement the core curriculum without detracting from it. The pattern thrives when elective courses are relevant, high-quality, and offer a diverse range of exploration.
